Parts.A: Relics

*Erik turns his attention from the dancer and looks at you*
  "Ahh..you again. You found Irena, yes? Good. It shows you have at least some ability to travel the land without ending stumling over your own feet. As you can see, I am very occupied here..thus can use some help with getting certain relics.
  If you bring them, you'll get paid."

*Erik turns serious*
  "Relics. To find them, you'll need to visit certain ruins and places and best the beings there. Some may be a challenge."
  *He hands you a list*
  "Choose yourself. I am willing to pay for one  each day"
Parts.B: Dregs; Witchqueen; Barrowking; Kinscourge; Sinkhole; Well of Skelos
Parts.C: That are dangerous places! Not with me!

Parts.A:
*Erik wrinkles his nose*
  "Ah..the dregs. What a smellin sewer..go to the end and find the aberration there. Bring me the Staff of the Triumvirate for the reward."
Relic hunter
"The Witchqueen..what a marvellous bitch. Be careful and bring me her Mask!"
Relic hunter

*A touch of anger and contepmt enter Erik's voice*
  "The King beneath..ha. You'll need blood and demon blood to enter his lair. Bring me the golden key he holds"
Parts.C: A key? Not gonna waste my time for that.

Parts.A: Relic hunter

*Erik looks grim.*
  "The black keep. Bring me the heart of the Kinscourge. Don't fall there..you might be trapped inside for eternity"
Relic hunter
"Go to the hole in the desert. The entrance lies east. It's a vile place and be prepared to face walking dead. Bring me the gem from the Dragon in the Arena"
Relic hunter
"The well of Skelos..last refuge of the Serpentmen..bring me their relic..the Trapezohedron. Don't fail there"
Relic hunter

"Hello, I am Erik the Red.

  What can I do for you today? Be quick, I am inspecting new talents here!"
*Erik looks expectantly at you*
Parts.B: I found this logpage and wondered what to do with it? (Logpage 3)
Parts.C: Uh. I was looking for Inga.

Parts.A: "What are you talking of? Which logpage? The one from the chest? Study the map and find the place"

*He looks at it briefly, then grunts and hands the page back to you*
  "Ah. Well, find the place. An old friend of mine may have use of this. It's in the furthest north - in case you did not guess that."
Logpage3
"Be sure to have some furs with you!"

"The Atlantean Queen has escaped her tomb..but there may still be traces of her left. Investigate the area on the map."

  "The Shaman Seidr is an old friend. He was seen around the paths to the crater above Dragonmouth. Maybe start looking for him in that area"
